title: Escape It All with a Chalet Stay Amidst Queensland’s Granite Belt
description: Just three hours yet a world away from Brisbane, Girraween Environmental Lodge offers a getaway in the truest sense of the word. Nestled amidst the spectacular raw natural beauty of bushland, water holes, granite boulders and colourful wildflowers in Queensland’s Granite Belt, the lodge offers a chance to disconnect from daily life and reconnect with the beauty of nature. Stay in a cosy chalet with a wood-fired heater and two-person spa bath with guaranteed early check-in and late check-out.
